mil7.7.4:5.1: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘pavanassa pañca aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamāni tāni pañca aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?
mil7.7.4:5.3: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena paresaṃ aparaddhaṃ khalitaṃ paṭicchādetabbaṃ na vivaritabbaṃ.
mil7.7.4:5.4: Idaṃ, mahārāja, pavanassa paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.7.4:6.1: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, pavanaṃ suññaṃ pacurajanehi;
mil7.7.4:6.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena rāgadosamohamānadiṭṭhijālehi sabbehi ca kilesehi suññena bhavitabbaṃ.
mil7.7.4:6.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, pavanassa dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.7.4:7.1: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, pavanaṃ vivittaṃ janasambādharahitaṃ;
mil7.7.4:7.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena pāpakehi akusalehi dhammehi anariyehi pavivittena bhavitabbaṃ.
mil7.7.4:7.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, pavanassa tatiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.7.4:8.1: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, pavanaṃ santaṃ parisuddhaṃ;
mil7.7.4:8.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena santena parisuddhena bhavitabbaṃ, nibbutena pahīnamānena pahīnamakkhena bhavitabbaṃ.
mil7.7.4:8.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, pavanassa catutthaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.7.4:9.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena ariyajanasaṃsevitena bhavitabbaṃ.
mil7.7.4:9.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, pavanassa pañcamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
